Class plain_report_formatter

boost::unit_test::output::plain_report_formatter

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/test/output/plain_report_formatter.hpp>


class plain_report_formatter :
  public boost::unit_test::results_reporter::format
{
public:
  // construct/copy/destruct
  plain_report_formatter();

  // public member functions
  virtual void results_report_start(std::ostream &);
  virtual void results_report_finish(std::ostream &);
  virtual void test_unit_report_start(test_unit const &, std::ostream &);
  virtual void test_unit_report_finish(test_unit const &, std::ostream &);
  virtual void do_confirmation_report(test_unit const &, std::ostream &);
};

Description

  1. plain_report_formatter();

plain_report_formatter public member functions

  2. virtual void results_report_finish(std::ostream & ostr);
  3. virtual void test_unit_report_start(test_unit const &, std::ostream & ostr);
  4. virtual void test_unit_report_finish(test_unit const &, std::ostream & ostr);
  5. virtual void do_confirmation_report(test_unit const &, std::ostream & ostr);
